sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router"; import "./singlePost.css" export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); //variable that stores postID const path = (location.pathname.split("/")[2]); const [post, setPost] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const getPost = async ()=>{ const res = await axios.get("/posts/"+path); setPost(res.data) } getPost() }, [path]) return (

{post.title}

{post.photo && ()}
Posted By: {post.username} {new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}
Workout of the Day:
{post.firstExercise && ({post.firstExercise}  )} {post.firstExerciseWeight && ({post.firstExerciseWeight}#)} {post.firstExerciseSet && ( x)}  {post.firstExerciseReps}
{post.secondExercise && ({post.secondExercise}  )} {post.secondExerciseWeight && ({post.secondExerciseWeight}#)} {post.secondExerciseSets} x  {post.secondExerciseReps}
{post.thirdExercise && ({post.thirdExercise}  )} {post.thirdExerciseWeight && ({post.thirdExerciseWeight}#)} {post.thirdExerciseSets} x  {post.thirdExerciseReps}
{post.fourthExercise && ({post.fourthExercise}  )} {post.fourthExerciseWeight && ({post.fourthExerciseWeight}#)} {post.fourthExerciseSets} x  {post.fourthExerciseReps}
{post.fifthExercise && ({post.fifthExercise}  )} {post.fifthExerciseWeight && ({post.fifthExerciseWeight}#)} {post.fifthExerciseSets } x  {post.fifthExerciseReps}
{post.sixthExercise && ({post.sixthExercise}  )} {post.sixthExerciseWeight && ({post.sixthExerciseWeight}#)} {post.sixthExerciseSets} x  {post.sixthExerciseReps}

{post.description}

) }
